title: How would you rate 'Train to Pakistan', a novel by Khushwant Singh, out of 10? Is it worth the read? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you are looking for a short but a gripping read…I would suggest Train to Pakistan….The literary style of K.Singh is simple and to the point.Since this novel depicts real life events of India & Pakistan partition, he just narrated the whole plot without any induced and unnecessary dramatisation. I would rate the book a solid 6 and would suggest it to be read on a journey….well it has train in its title..isn't it..?
